SOLD
]:
 I need to prove to myself I can do this.


…


[DATA
 
ARCHIVED
]:
 I'm sorry.




[END LOG]










Audiovisual Transcript






[DATA
 
INSPECTED
]
 wakes up from the pain, and crawls out of bed. There are no windows. The air is suffocating. Blue miasma creeps towards 
its
 irises.


DEW
 enters the room, worry-striken, and helps 
it
 to 
its
 feet. 
Its
 head breaks the ceiling. No words are exchanged.


It
 sighs. 
It
 sits until thought returns.


DEW
 points to a bird out the window. There is no window.


It
 ponders. 
It
 reaches for a boot, which begins to approach. 
It
 knows.


It
 kisses 
DEW
, as their form and the stage they both stand upon begin to fade to black. 
It
 sighs.


It
 dons the boot and trudges outside.




[END LOG]








Addendum SCP-8192.1:
 The Langnoetic Model describes the Hume field as a vector field, that is, as a physical field that can flow. Hume charge flows "down" from the Noosphere
5
 unto the physical world, where will and conscious change is manifested by flow of Hume charge into matter. While ontokenesis is traditionally thought of as a property of beings, the Langnoetic Model describes it as a property of thought and concept, potentially embodied in being. Thus, even abstract concepts may exhibit ontokinetic properties.


The strength of Hume emitters, then, is purely determined by the strength of its corresponding concept(s) in the Noosphere. Hume charge decays as it flows, resulting in Hume emitters possessing circular areas of influence with radius directly proportional to their strength. Hume emitters, however, tend towards point sources, and therefore spacially-distributed embodiments will only emit Hume charge within its area of greatest geo-semiotic density.








Preliminary Investigation into SCP-8192-1


Addendum SCP-8192.2






Abstract:
 The sudden onset of SCP-8192, considered purely theoretical beforehand, has provided the Foundation with an incredible oppertunity to study the phenomenology and sociology of both ultra-low and ultra-high Hume spaces. This study focuses primarily on the billions subjected to near-zero Hume conditions. We find that, at such low levels, the human subconscious is able to overtake the conscious in reality-bending capability, following the theorized logarithmic model of Hume differential. In all subjects studied, this is realized by the perpetual reconfiguration of surrounding space into ever-changing, pseudo-Oneiric states. We recommend followup studies on the long-term effects of uninterrupted confinement within such spaces.










Audiovisual Transcript


Addendum SCP-8192-1.2






It
 trudges through a nondescript landscape, utterly alone. 
It
 trips, tumbles, and slowly stands back up.


[DATA
 
TRACKED
]:
 So, so so so so, I'm reality-bending here still. it's a little harder though…


Collapse, wait, stand up.


[DATA
 
TAGGED
]:
 And back home my mind bent the world with barely a thought or will…


Sit, rest,


[DATA
 
UNRELEASED
]:
 My best guess is a Hume field collapse. We can construct a gradient of Hume strength over space… if we head towards stronger reality, maybe we'll get to the source of this shit?


stand up.


[DATA
 
DESCRIBED
]:
 Just wish it wasn't so far…


The road stretches on


[DATA
 
RECUPERATED
]:
 Wonder what caused… 
wheeze
 …this mess…


till the world curves back unto itself


[DATA
 
DESECRATED
]:
 …wonder if 
DEW
's okay… 
wheeze
 …maybe they'll just think it's a bad dream… 
wheeze
 …I hope so, at least…


and in the turn of that cycle, wildgrass sprouts from the ground, overtaking the peripheries of vision. Roads cross.


[DATA
 
REPURPOSED
]:
 Why… 
wheeze
 …am I doing this… 
wheeze
 …when…


It
 trudges through a highway, perfectly still, alone save for one, sitting on the side of the road.


[DATA
 
DISCOVERED
]:
 Oh… 
wheeze


It
 sits beside them.


ETRANGER:
 Why indeed? I see you travelling with purpose, yet every step seems to break you further.


wheeze


ETRANGER:
 Thank you for chosing to sit. What's ailing you, friend?


Time passess, still.


wheeze


wheeze


cough


wheeze


[DATA
 
ABANDONED
]:
 This nightmare we're both trapped within! Haven't you felt that… maelstrom at the edges of your vision?


ETRANGER:
 Of course I have, but here we walk in the realm of the lucid. So the world has been upturned; so what? Our space is finally still, save for the ripples we create.


[DATA
 
CONTAINED
]:
 I swore to protect the world as it was, to help the people within it. If… 
wheeze
 if everyone's experiencing what I did…


ETRANGER:
 But you could work to bring them into lucidity too; and yet you choose another way. You trudge towards the palace of the old world. I can tell it hurts you as it does I, friend. Why do you fight so to uphold these conditions? Why not work towards a better world?


[DATA
 
DEPARTMENTALIZED
]:
 …


[DATA
 
SCRUTINIZED
]:
 I was caught in that palace before all this, you know. Call me a coward, but I can't imagine the world without it.


[DATA
 
TRAPPED
]:
 I know there are more in there, trapped like us. Maybe… maybe together, we can change something.


ETRANGER:
 You know they won't let you do that, right?


[DATA
 
DETAINED
]:
 …


ETRANGER
 produces a pair of dark green, left-handed safety scissors.


ETRANGER:
 Take these, before you go.


It
 takes the scissors with the right hand.


ETRANGER:
 I wish you luck, 
JAILOR
.




[END LOG]








Addendum SCP-8192.3
: The following internal memo began regular distribution following the successful containment of SCP-8192-2:






Notice to Site-01 Level 3 Staff




All information hereafter disclosed is strictly confidential. Reproduction for unauthorized personnel is subject to harsh penalty, up to and including termination.




If you're reading this document, you now have sufficient clearance to know about SCP-8192; congratulations! SCP-8192 is an incredible tool for improving your (yes, your!) productivity, developed by Overwatch Command at this very Site.


How does it work?


Periods of SCP-8192 activation are scheduled approximately every month, lasting no longer than a week. Within these periods, your executive function and applied skills will increase drastically! This service is provided to all trusted Site-01 personnel, at no cost.


What should I expect?


During SCP-8192 activation, you may experience various side-effects. Don't be alarmed, these are perfectly normal, and have been shown to have no long-lasting effects! Common side-effects include:




Light sensitivity


Altered internal monologue


Executive overfunction


Physical weakness


Immutability


Dedication to cause


Increased focus


Temporary depersonalization


Amelioration of derealization


Cure of physical and mental disability




After the end of each SCP-8192 activation, you may experience several "rebound effects," lasting at most one hour in those without pre-existing conditions. Symptoms include:




Brain zaps


Sensory overwhelm


Muscle ache


Ennui




But don't worry! You'll be under close watch by our expert psychiatry team, to make sure you have the best experience possible.


Is there a catch?


Not at all! This is standard practice, and your co-workers can all attest to its positive effects. It's just another privilege of employment at the SCP Foundation.


What if I'm on vacation?


SCP-8192 periods are considered "all hands on deck," and no excuses for leave are permitted.


May I be exempted?


You may request exemption, in which case you will not gain the benefits of SCP-8192 afforded to Site-01 staff trusted such as yourself. You will be administered Class-C "Targeted" amnestics in order to prevent disclosure of information within this document, and will not be presented this offer again.






Addendum SCP-8192-1.3:
 Cameras used in the capture of Addenda SCP-8192-1.1 and SCP-8192-1.2 have no records following 
[DATA
 
USED
]
's emergence into superreal space surrounding Site-01. Due to the saturated Hume levels of the surroundings, recollective archives pulled using Foundation memory scrapers have been deemed accurate to real events at the time.


All recollections extracted from Foundation staff on-site during the onset of SCP-8192-1 have been found to be irreparably corrupt, thus the following scraped memories are the only documentation of the successful containment of SCP-8192-1.


Remember: Everything in this document is real.






Memory Log






Subject:
 
[DATA
 
SUSTAINED
]

Location:
 Site-01 Visitor Atrium


Type:
 Oneirotypical




You enter through glass doors into a grand foyer, tall as it is wide, hewn from seamless marble.


Sterile white floods your eyes, burning Stygian marks into your vision.


Click, clack. Your footsteps are silent to the room, but oh-so-loud to yourself.


Click, clack. The whistle of air through your nose. Blinding white. The room is utterly quiet, save for you.


Receptionist
 breaks the silence like a tsunami against a shore.


Receptionist:
 Hello! Welcome to 
FOUNDATION
 Site-01, home of Overwatch Command!


[DATA
 
REUSED
]:
 H-hi! Could you-


Receptionist:
 
[DATA
 
IDENTIFIED
]
, employee number 
698-56F-8192
?


[DATA
 
DRAWN
]:
 … y-


Receptionist:
 Great! It appears that you have no assignments or appointments at this site. Unfortunately, due to the high-security measures in place, we must ask you to verify your identity and allegiance to the 
FOUNDATION
. Does the black moon howl?


[DATA
 
DISMANTLED
]:
 [INAUDIBLE]
6


The overpowering light begins to sear the thin hairs on your arms.


Receptionist
 stares intently. Everything is still.


[DATA
 
BOUND
]:
 …[INAUDIBLE]


…


[DATA

]:
 [INAUDIBLE]!

 Time allowance expended. Please standby for further processing. Have a nice day!


[DATA
 
ISOLATED
]:
 [INAUDIBLE]!!!


Huge, gloved hands latch onto your shoulders. Your skin stings and melts before their grip. It hurts. It's bright. It hurts. It's loud. So loud. So bright. So tight. It's crushing it's crushing you're trying to breath you're hyperventilating


Sound just barely clears your lips-


WHAM




[END LOG]










Memory Log






Subject:
 
[DATA
 
CAPTURED
]


Scraper:
 Subjectivity Rewind 8.3.4 (-cRi)


Location:
 Site-01 Research Wing B


Type:
 Oneirotypical




Alarm blaring. Running through dirty-gray side-halls. Red and white flashes pierce your irises. Your eyes won't focus. Your feet are numb.


Office 5306 
Researcher
. Office 5608 
Emeritus
. Infoboard on Financial Esoterica. Break Room 5610. Event Postings. Office 5612 
Technician
.


Crossroads. You frantically scan the three paths, trying desperately to attach it to your mental map. Left would take you closer to the Eye of the Storm.


As you round the corner, you see the only other inhabitant of these halls notice you.


Their eyes are bloodshot and drowned in intent. They give chase.


Stiff, labored breaths; irregular sprint becomes footsteps becomes stomps.


It's over. You can't outrun anyone, you know that, but…


As you Collapse onto the scorching tile, you hear another thud behind you.


Labored breath and a faint, desperate clawing for air behind you.


…wheeze…


[DATA
 
SCARED
]:
 [INAUDIBLE]


…wheeze…


You pull yourself, slowly, towards them along the ground.


Nearing, you notice things you haven't before.


[DATA
 
GASLIT
]:
 [INAUDIBLE]!!!


Their own darkened blood pools around their frail body, coating the floor as if it hungered for their very life. Blue overtakes their face.


You can see deep bruises along their arms and legs.


[DATA
 
OVERTAKEN
]:
 h-


[DATA
 
DISSECTED
]:
 …


[DATA
 
DIGESTED
]:
 h-hey…


They're hyperventilating.


[DATA
 
RAIDED
]:
 …


You let your face relax, just a little. You crawl closer to them.


They look ragged.


[DATA
 
EDUCATED
]:
 why are you doing this, when…


With trepedation, you carefully put your right hand on their shoulder.


[DATA
 
TERMINATED
]:
 AAUGH


Sharp pain, the scream of dismemberment, and utter numbness.


The flesh sloughs off your dominant hand, mixing into the blood you both are caught within.


They gasp.


Professor:
 FUCK


Professor:
 Oh fuck I…. auugh…


Professor:
 What… what happened? Is this my blood?


[DATA
 
SEQUESTERED
]:
 ZK-Class "Reality Failure" caused by collapse of the Hume field.


[DATA
 
COMPELLED
]:
 Why were you chasing me?


Professor:
 Shit.


Professor:
 I… don't know.


[DATA
 
STUDIED
]:
 Compulsive effects in superreality? Interesting.


[DATA
 
BOXED
]:
 I… I don't think this is going to end unless we do something.


Professor:
 Isn't the 
FOUNDATION
 working to fix it?


…


[DATA
 
OVERDETERMINED
]:
 You coming or not?


Professor:
 Let me… rest a bit, first.




[END LOG]










Memory Log






Subject:
 
[DATA
 
PROTECTED
]


Scraper:
 Subjectivity Rewind 8.3.4 (-cRi)


Location:
 Site-01 O5 Councilchamber


Type:
 Ruminant-Adjacent




Long and too-long wandering through these central halls, you both finally stand outside the Chamber's door.


It won't fucking budge.


Professor:
 Huh.


[DATA
 
SHELVED
]:
 Well, the door's immersed in overreality, so it's probably self-reinforcing now-


Professor
 takes a gun out their pocket, and shoots the hinges off.


BLAM- BLAM- Flinch- Your ears are ringing and your head is aching.


[DATA
 
MONOPOLIZED
]:
 FUCK YOU SHOULD'VE WARNED ME


Professor:
 Sorry.


Blinding light shines through the bulletholes, searing regions of your vision away as you look at it.


Professor
 pushes the doors open, and you can't take it anymore.


Even with your eyes closed, the cleanroom-white still shines through your eyelids enough to trigger a migraine.


Professor:
 Whoa… are you seeing this?


[DATA
 
KEPT
]:
 No, I can't… I can't see. What's happening?


Professor:
 It's the O5 Councilchamber alright. Not how I imagined it'd be though.


Professor
 limps forward.


Professor:
 Thirteen chairs for thirteen Overseers. Thirteen thin, glowing red strings, each reaching from a sky into a vacant chair.


[DATA
 
REIFIED
]:
 That's… that's a Hume tether. Predicted by the Langnoetic Model. Nobody's ever seen one before. Guess I'm not lucky enough to be the first.


Footsteps in the distance. The alarm takes multiple higher frequencies, and a staccato tone.


Professor:
 So what's the plan??


[DATA
 
ENTRENCHED
]:
 No fucking clue!


You half-open your eyes, in desperate search for the nearest chair. You see a red and gold blob that you can only assume to be one.


Professor:
 Fuck, I'll… I'll hold them off?


A stumble, a limp, and the slow, creaking close of the door.


You approach the blob, bumping into gilded chair and royal table alike. Eventually, you feel glazed hardwood under your bare wrist.


With your remaining hand, you grab the scissors in your back pocket, reach up, and…




Snip.






The ground buckles.




Snip.






The miasma clears, ever-so-slightly.




Snip.






Brain fog that you never noticed clears away.




Snip.






Your arm begins to bleed.




Snip.






Your throat is hoarse.




Snip.






Your lungs wheeze.




Snip.






Your legs ache.




Snip.






The ground cracks.




Snip.






The heavenly light falters.




Snip.






Colors dull.




Snip.






You can't breathe.




Snip.






The sky falls.




Snip.






The pain stirs even the Earth from its slumber.




[END LOG]








Addenum SCP-8192.4:
 In all SCP-8192 instances to date (39 as of 2032-04-29), ancillary Foundation personnel have, acting independantly, restored normalcy before MTF Alpha-1 "Red Right Hand"'s scheduled protocol. Overwatch Command has approved recommendation to replace MTF Alpha-1's role in containment with a new Applied Task Force (ATF Alpha-8192) comprised of the aforementioned Foundation personnel.


All members of ATF Alpha-8192 have been prescribed indefinite Class-H "Anterograde" amnestic therapy in order to prevent variation in duty which could jeopardize eventual SCP-8192 re-containment.

containment_procedures: Following the events of SCP-8192-1, SCP-8192 has been reclassified from Unknown to Kalpa1-Thaumiel.
description: The Langnoetic Model of the Hume field2 predicts the existence of metastable Hume baselines, subject to instability and eventual collapse. Extremely high levels of net Hume vector-field divergence are theorized to result in decoherence amongst Hume sinks until eventual baseline reconfiguration into a much lower Hume baseline. In such a situation, it is likely that the only remaining regions of normalcy will be on the periphery of the Hume emitters that caused the effect in the first place, acting as a boundary between regions of superreality and areality. This mechanism of reality failure due to Hume overemittance was designated SCP-8192 in order to facilitate further research.
